Amount input component

Component for money and currency formatting

Requirements

  • Support standard input functionality (eg. placeholder)
  • Support labels
  • Display currency symbol on blur
  • Format number with locale on blur

Usage example:

Model value: 


    Widget.controller('MainCtrl', function () {
        this.amount = 0;
        this.options = {
            currencySymbol: '$'
        }
    });
    

    <input lp-amount-input="{{mainCtrl.options}}" ng-model="mainCtrl.amount" placeholder="Enter amount" />

Default options:

  • decimals: 2
  • hideGroupSep: false
  • allowNegative: false
  • currencySymbol: '' //leave empty to use locale settings by default
